overview: • Can Christians be Demon Possessed? • What is the difference in Demon Oppression and Demon Possession? • Are homosexuals, kleptomaniacs, pathological liars, etc born that way?  The answer to these questions Scripturally will open your eyes.  The teaching contained therein is a must for every Believer.
tagline: Taken from the Daily Broadcasts aired March 6-9, 2006
title: Demon Oppression & Demon Possession
